1.title: Caught in the Act
1.plot: A covert sting nets a paua poaching ring in Wellington, the maritime police are called to the rescue and a roadside checkpoint turns up a few surprises.

2.title: Stranded at Sea
2.plot: A fishing trawler runs aground on the Manukau Bar, M-Fish swoop on an illegal paua ring and a showdown in Northland.

3.title: Poacher Patrol
3.plot: A group of poachers are caught on a remote Northland beach, the Maritime Police catch some boat thieves in the act and a SOS from an injured boater.

4.title: Car Full of Cockles
4.plot: M-Fish confront a group with thousands of illegal cockles and later play cat and mouse with an an elusive poacher.

5.title: Restaurant Raids
5.plot: M-Fish conduct a series of restaurant raids in Auckland. The Airforce launches a dangerous search and rescue mission in the middle of a cyclone.

6.title: Trapped
6.plot: M-Fish and the Navy combine to bust a poaching ring in the Chatham Islands and the Martime police respond to a mysterious sinking in the Hauraki Gulf.

7.title: No Excuses
7.plot: It's a holiday weekend and M-Fish are conducting a two-day operation aimed at cracking down on recreational overfishing

8.title: A Toxic Situation
8.plot: Toxic chemicals threaten the Poor Knights Islands and dogs assist the D-O-C on a unique mission.

9.title: Seized Vessel
9.plot: A fisherman lashed out as his boat gets seized, confrontation over paua in New Plymouth and a New Year's Eve dive goes terribly wrong.

10.title: Double Trouble
10.plot: A raid on a crayfish seller uncovers more than just black market fish and in Northland a M-Fish sting nets a group of poachers.

1.title: A Covert Operation
1.plot: The M-Fish officers launch a covert operation to crack down on paua poachers. Maritime Police search for missing weapons onboard a vessel.

2.title: Crayfish Crackdown
2.plot: M-Fish officers are on the look out for crayfish poachers. Maritime Police transport an unruly prisoner.

3.title: Operation Onimod
3.plot: M-Fish officers launch a covert surveillance operation to bust Paua poachers. Maritime Police make an overdue arrest.

4.title: Airborne Patrol
4.plot: M-Fish officers face confrontation near Gisborne; head to the skies to look for rogue trawlers and later come to the rescue on 90 Mile Beach.

5.title: A Stowaway and a Standoff
5.plot: Martime Police race to capture a stowaway. M. Fish officer Gary McAneny conducts random inspections of commercial vessels at Onehunga wharf.

6.title: Too Many Cockles
6.plot: M-Fish respond to a tip-off about paua poachers. Maritime Police respond to a distress call on the Hauraki Gulf and later spot something unexpected in the water.

7.title: A Midnight Confrontation
7.plot: M-Fish officers bust an illegal fishing operation that leads to a midnight confrontation on the Hauraki Gulf.

8.title: Busting a Black Marketeer
8.plot: An undercover operation nets a notorious black marketeer and the police dive squad are called into action after a tragic accident.

9.title: Trouble on the Coast
9.plot: M-Fish and the Martime Police combine forces to launch Operation Iris, a two-day crackdown on known paua poaching hotspots along the coast.

imdb.plot outline: On Coastwatch, the men and women of The New Zealand's Ministry of Fisheries fight to protect and patrol the country's precious coastal waters. Throughout this season, the organization faces a number of huge tasks - from illegal fishing, to highly organized poaching rings with criminal networks stretching into Asia and the Pacific, to the relentless tide of reckless shell food gatherers and recreational fishermen who often exceed their daily limit. Carrying out over 27,000 inspections, seizing boats, vehicles and other fishing equipment, watch as they fight to prevent illegal coastal activity and do whatever it takes to keep the environment clean.
